attributes.title: Terrible app disgusting
attributes.review: This app took 2 weeks to download and when it was downloading it made my phone smell terrible but when it finally downloaded it asked for my social sicurity number and address and when I did a week later FBI agents came to my house and shot my dog and gave me a fine of 100,00$ other than that this app gave my phone a bug and every time i tried to show my family the app so they can see what‚Äôs going on with the government my daughter with epilepsy had a seizure and so we had to take her to the hospital and sadly passed away all because of this app the app also gave my phone a bug which made me have to buy a new phone and also sometimes Cheeto dust would just apear on the screen and in my house no one eats Cheetos nor do we buy them so I‚Äôm guessing it came from the president and also the next day my son was playing on my phone and wanted to go in the app and he started to watch a video of one of the presidents speeches and I was in the other room so I could hear the speech from the kitchen while he was on the couch in the family room and I heard the president cough in the speech and then my son started coughing uncontrollably I till the point where he couldn‚Äôt breath so we rushed him to the hospital and when we got there we found out this app had given my son COVID-19 and the doctors said it was to late for him and he died all because of this app you took away 2 of my 6 kids because of this app there is no way I am voting for you or supporting you anymore!
